page.title: 04Old Houses and New
page.content: Some houses in our area are new,but many houses are very old.The old houses are mostly made out of millstone grit.The older houses are usually{terraced houses}built in long rows.Many houses have gardens,but some have been built 'back-to-back'.The old houses mostly have roofs made out of slates. Some of the old houses are being knocked down.{New houses}have been built in the same area.The new houses are of many different kinds.In Salt Street two houses have been knocked down,and they are building new houses there.A mosque and a house have been knocked down.In Valley Parade there were shops and houses knocked down and a petrol filling station has been built.Some blocks of flats were built about twenty years ago near our school.
